CustomField.formula:
IF( And( ISBLANK(Last_Contact_Made__c ),
ISBLANK( Last_Call_Attempt__c ) )
, 'No Contact Made' , IF( And( ISBLANK(Last_Contact_Made__c ),
NOT(ISBLANK( Last_Call_Attempt__c ) ) )
, ' Contact Attempted - No Success' ,
IF( And( Not(ISBLANK(Last_Contact_Made__c )),
NOT(ISBLANK( Last_Call_Attempt__c ) ) )
, 'Contact Made' ,
'Error')))
CustomField.label: Make Customer Contact
